'''Forest of Color''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Forest of Color is obtainable during {{Quest|To the Night, What is the Night's}}, from a [[Chest]] found next to [[Legba]].

Depending on the quality, Forest of Color revives and restores '''250'''/'''400'''/'''550''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown.

When [[Iansan]] cooks Forest of Color, there is a chance [[Gold-Standard Healthy Meal]] will be created instead.
